languages.text: "Так мало слов — но так много чувств... Я слышу эхо затаенной, выпестованной вражды. Такой, какая бывает только между возлюбленными или кровными родственниками".

traits.locale_text: "Так мало слов — но так много чувств... Я слышу эхо затаенной, выпестованной вражды. Такой, какая бывает только между возлюбленными или кровными родственниками".

languages.text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."
languages.original_text: "Так мало слов — но так много чувств... Я слышу эхо затаенной, выпестованной вражды. Такой, какая бывает только между возлюбленными или кровными родственниками".

traits.locale_text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."
"So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."
"So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."
"So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."

languages.text: 「言葉こそ少ないものの、様々な感情が渦巻いている…長い時間をかけて発展した根深い敵意を感じる。恋人同士や血縁者の間にしか存在しないような憎しみを」
languages.original_text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."

traits.locale_text: 「言葉は少ないけど、色んな感情が渦巻いている…長い時間をかけて発展した根深い敵意を感じるわ。恋人同士や血縁者の間にしか存在しないような憎しみね」

languages.text: “短短几句话，却蕴含如此之多的情感……我听到了根深蒂固、积怨已久的回声。只有爱人或亲族之间，才会存在这样的情感。”
languages.original_text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."

traits.locale_text: “短短几句话，却蕴含如此之多的情感……我听到了根深蒂固、积怨已久的回声。只有爱人或亲族之间，才会存在这样的情感。”

languages.text: «Muy pocas palabras, pero muchas emociones... Oigo el eco de una enemistad profunda y longeva. La clase que solo existe entre amantes o parientes».
languages.original_text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."

traits.locale_text: «Muy pocas palabras, pero muchas emociones... Oigo el eco de una enemistad profunda y longeva. La clase que solo existe entre amantes o parientes».

languages.text: « Bien peu de mots pour tant d'émotions... J'entends l'écho d'une animosité profonde et entretenue depuis bien longtemps, de celles qui n'existent qu'entre les amants et les membres d'une même famille. »
languages.original_text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."

traits.locale_text: « Bien peu de mots pour tant d'émotions... J'entends l'écho d'une animosité profonde et entretenue depuis bien longtemps, de celles qui n'existent qu'entre les amants et les membres d'une même famille. »

languages.text: "So viele Emotionen in so wenigen Worten. Ich höre das Echo einer tiefen, lange genährten Feindseligkeit. Von der Art, wie sie nur zwischen Liebenden oder Blutsverwandten existiert."
languages.original_text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."

traits.locale_text: "So viele Emotionen in so wenigen Worten. Ich höre das Echo einer tiefen, lange genährten Feindseligkeit. Von der Art, wie sie nur zwischen Liebenden oder Blutsverwandten existiert."

languages.text: "Az laf, çok duygu. Derinlere yerleşmiş ve uzunca bir süre beslenmiş bir kinin yankısını duyabiliyorum. Yalnızca âşıklar ya da kan hısımları arasında olan cinsten."
languages.original_text: "So few words, but so many emotions... I hear the echo of deep-seated, long-nurtured enmity. The kind that exists only between lovers or blood relations."

traits.locale_text: "Çok az sözcük, çok fazla duygu. Derinlere yerleşmiş ve uzunca bir süre beslenmiş bir kinin yankısını duyabiliyorum. Yalnızca âşıklar ya da aralarında kan bağı olanlar arasında olan cinsten."
